title: Repo sync

Removed deprecated text completion feature for PR descriptions and associated content.
Adjusted REST API rate limit for Search code endpoint to 9 requests per minute.
Fixed broken DevOps solutions comparison links.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
